sentences.sentence: The value of Japan increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2015; while Britain, America and China keep stable between 2010 and 2015.
The sum value of Japan, Britain, America and China keep stable between 2010 and 2011, then it increase by 2013, then it keep stable by 2015.

sentences.sentence: The value of Japan increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2015; while Britain, America and China keep stable between 2010 and 2015.
The sum value of Japan, Britain, America and China keep stable between 2010 and 2011, then it increase by 2013, then it keep stable by 2015.
